title: Club Again (feat. Yo Gotti)
lyrics:
How the fuck you let another nigga see you naked?
How the fuck you let another nigga see you naked?
How the fuck you let another nigga see you naked?
How the fuck you let another nigga see you naked?
Now I'm back up in that club again, yeah

Now i'm back on these drugs again, yeah

I told my self I'd never cuff again, yeah

I can't be the one suffering



I just broke up with my girlfriend

And she just broke up with her boyfriend

She said she pretty much done with men

Till we took a shot and started talkin' (aww)

Now she wide open, I'm in go mode

Came with my niggas, never solo

So when its time to leave, girl come with me

What's your number girl, what's your IG? (aww yeah)



Now I'm back up in that club again, yeah

Now i'm back on these drugs again, yeah

I told my self I'd never cuff again, yeah

I can't be the one suffering



I can't see myself selling drugs again

I can't see myself falling in love again

My little homie ran off on the plug again

Magic city I'm fucking up the club again (again)

I just want to win and she just wants to do something different but I'm still just the same nigga

You don't like it, get a lame nigga

I-I don't trust these bitches anyway

She like tell the truth, I ain't got shit to say

Street nigga, yeah been that way

I need a real bitch and it gon' stay that way

The-These bitches ain't loyal

Always want a nigga spoil

I've been tryin' best to avoid you

Hit da end button, I ignored you

You on my phone again

You in my home again

Won't leave me alone again

God don't like ugly but you know I'm known to sin

So I did you wrong, again



Now I'm back up in that club again, yeah

Now i'm back on these drugs again, yeah

I told my self I'd never cuff again, yeah

I can't be the one suffering

(Aw yeah)



Now my ex wanna fuck again, yeah

Blocked the bitch, then I blocked her friend, yeah

Niggas in the clubs sponsoring

I-I-I ain't even given compliments (nahhh nahhh)

You on the side like some condiments

But I still squeeze that ass with confidence

If you really want it, meet me in the lobby

Good sex, girl you know I got it

Please forgive me, I'm bout to catch a body, lord



Now I'm back up in that club again, yeah

Now i'm back on these drugs again, yeah

I told my self I'd never cuff again, yeah

I can't be the one suffering
